cab.content: Colonel W. Daily Jones.(This Document js the Property of 3 j j 7His 6ritansnio Majesty's Covernment) T.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 8th SEPTEMBER, 1918,1* WESTERN FRONT *(a) British Front. There is no change in the situation,ft) French Front, Except for a small advance south of the OISE towards the western outskirts of SERVAIS there is nothing to report-.The French have maintained their gains in the neighbourhood of LAFFAUX and CELLES-SUR-AISNE, in spite of several enemy counter-attacks2 * ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS,There is nothing of interest to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1, ' 8th September, 1918,Issued at 6,15 p,m.mam nn iiwseii orof the IV?
